title: Update Outdated Knowledge Base Article
description: A customer points out that a knowledge base article is outdated and its screenshots no longer match the current user interface.

tasks.description: Locate the outdated article based on the customer's feedback.
Take new screenshots of the current UI and update the step-by-step instructions in the article.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the article to be accurate and current.

tasks.description: Publish the updated article and thank the customer for their feedback.
tasks.expected_outcome: The documentation is corrected, and the customer feels valued.
